applyBoxes.title: Tourist Visa
applyBoxes.description: Are you planning to come to Qatar for visiting its beautiful spots? Request Hayya to enter the country

applyBoxes.title: Conferences & Events
applyBoxes.description: Will you attend an event or conference hosted in Qatar? To participate you need to get an Hayya

applyBoxes.title: Hayya with Me
applyBoxes.description: Do you receive a voucher code by a family member or a friends? Redeem your code and request Hayya.

journeyBoxes.heading: Know your Visa Type
journeyBoxes.description: Three VISA types are available based on your purpose of travel and/or your corresponding eligibility criteria.

journeyBoxes.heading: Fill In three Stages
journeyBoxes.description: Your personal, residence, and accommodation information will be collected and processed before approving your VISA.

journeyBoxes.heading: Get your Hayya Card!
journeyBoxes.description: After the provided information is reviewed and approved, your hayya digital card will be issued in no time.

mobileAppSection.appDescription: Manage all of your activities through a unified window.
mobileAppSection.downloadDescription: Download the app to manage your Hayya ID, keep track of your events and stay on track with your travel plan.

slides.heading: Welcome to Hayya
slides.subTitle: the HAYYA EXPerience
slides.description: Discover a world of services with your Hayya Card, from accommodation to transportation, health insurance, and access to events.

slides.heading: Qatar Expo 2023
slides.subTitle: the HAYYA EXPerience
slides.description: GCC residents can pre-register their vehicles with their beloved accompanying passengers and save  time and effort at Qatar’s Abu-Samra border checkpoint.

slides.heading: AFC Asian Cup 2023
slides.subTitle: the HAYYA EXPerience
slides.description: The AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023™ is all set to take place in Qatar and will see Asia’s top 24 nations eyeing one of the most prestigious titles in Asian football.

slides.heading: Grand Prix 2023
slides.subTitle: the HAYYA EXPerience
slides.description: Get up to speed with everything you need to know about the 2023 Qatar Grand Prix, which takes place at the 5.38-kilometre Lusail International Circuit on Sunday, October 8.
